```{r echo = FALSE, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```

This document will show how to tidy data.

```{r}
pulse_df = 
  haven::read_sas("data/public_pulse_data.sas7bdat") |>
  janitor::clean_names()
```

```{r}
pulse_tidy_df =
  pulse_df |>
  pivot_longer(
    cols = bdi_score_bl:bdi_score_12m,
    names_to = "visit", 
    values_to = "bdi",
    names_prefix = "bdi_score_"
  ) |>
  mutate(
    visit = replace(visit, visit == "bl", "00m")
  ) |>
  relocate(id, visit)
```
